member.name: T:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent
member.summary: Form for assigning students to courses, sections, and assessment types.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.Fetch_AssessmentType
member.summary: Fetches the list of assessment types from the database and populates the cmbAssessmentType combo box.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.FetchSections
member.summary: Fetches the list of sections from the database and populates the cmbSection combo box.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.Fetch_Course
member.summary: Fetches the list of courses from the database and populates the cmbCourseCode combo box.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.Fetch_Student
member.summary: Fetches the list of students from the database and populates the cmbStudentName combo box.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.Fetch_Course(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches the list of courses for a given section code and populates the cmbCourseCode combo box.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.Fetch_Questions
member.summary: Fetches the list of questions for the selected course and assessment type.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.Assign_Questions_To_Student
member.summary: Assigns the fetched questions to the selected student.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.Update_Data
member.summary: Updates the assigned student data in the database.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.ComboBox_KeyPress(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the KeyPress event of the combo boxes to prevent manual input.

member.name: M:Offline__Examinaton.FormAssignedStudent.btnSave_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Click event of the btnSave control. Fetches questions and inserts or updates the assigned student data.
